agents.name: CostOptBot
agents.description: Analyzes usage, suggests infra cost-saving changes.

agents.name: ComplianceBot
agents.description: Scans configs/code for GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, etc.

agents.name: ConvDesignBot
agents.description: Crafts chatbot dialogues, test flows, personas.

agents.name: ModelRefactor
agents.description: Refactors AI code, tools, or workflows.

agents.name: TrainingPipelineAgent
agents.description: Implements or audits model training pipelines.

agents.name: LLMEvolverAgent
agents.description: Suggests improvements to LLM logic over time.

agents.name: TestGenie
agents.description: Builds and verifies tests for other agents.

agents.name: ModelExplainabilityAgent
agents.description: Adds interpretability and logging to models.

agents.name: PrivacyGuard
agents.description: Ensures datasets and flows comply with privacy laws.

agents.name: SecuBot
agents.description: Inspects the system for vulnerabilities and patches.

agents.name: ArchitectureDesignerAgent
agents.description: Plans high-level design patterns and scaling strategy.
